title: Cosmopolitan Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Cosmopolitan Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
4 mins
Active
4 mins
Total
4 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1 1/2
ounces
citrus-flavored
vodka
1/2
ounce
triple sec
(Cointreau, preferably)
1/2
ounce
cranberry juice
1/4
ounce
lime juice
(fresh, fresh, fresh; no Rose's)
Orange twist
, for garnish
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry, and lime, and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and cocktail strainer
Vodka
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
